title: Drawing, ca. 1760
medium: Graphite, black crayon, brush and gray watercolor on laid paper
markings: watermark: Strasburg lily, below: beehive and C and J HONIG
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: In the center a big angel in clouds is supporting a branch, ending as a candlestick with three burning candles. Beside him, a small flying angel with a garland. A curved attic serves as architectural motif. Around its termination in the front are two branches on every side, each supporting the burning candles. Below a scale.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, ca. 1760. Graphite, black crayon, brush and gray watercolor on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2552.
